name: ZU - CHAPTER 1 & 2
description:
You always get so nervous when it's your turn to be confronted with any nonsense...

You must be braver!

Otherwise, you will relapse with any small problem.

Embark on the adventure of Zu, a girl with an unknown past who, under unknown circumstances, finds herself in a new and strange world. Will she be able to escape from that reality?

WARNING: This game contains images and themes that may be disturbing to some people.

Finally after almost a year of work, ZU chapters 1 and 2 have been released, I hope you enjoy this new version of ZU! Any comment, review, or donation helps a lot to continue the development of the game and will be greatly appreciated! <3
